TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit RenderOptions extends System.Object
public ref class RenderOptions abstract sealed

summary.span: 提供用于控制对象的呈现行为的选项。

span.span: Provides options for controlling the rendering behavior of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用的附加的属性类，以在 WPF 应用程序中指定的文本和可视元素的呈现选项。You can use the attached properties of the class to specify options for the rendering of text and visual elements in your WPF application. 这些选项使您能够优化呈现速度还是注重质量。These options enable you to optimize rendering for speed or quality.

summary.span: 获取或设置给定 的 。

span.span: Gets or sets the for a given .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用上的属性或对位图进行动画处理的后代。Use the property on a or descendant that is animating a bitmap. 对任何位图缩放进行动画处理时，默认高质量图像重采样算法有时可能由于消耗过多系统资源导致帧速率下降，从而导致动画明显变慢。When animating the scale of any bitmap, the default high-quality image re-sampling algorithm can sometimes consume sufficient system resources to cause frame rate degradation, effectively causing animations to stutter. 通过设置属性设置为，缩放位图时，可以创建更为流畅的动画。By setting the property to , you can create a smoother animation when scaling a bitmap. 若要访问此属性在代码中的，使用和方法。To access this property in code, use the and methods. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.DependencyProperty BitmapScalingModeProperty
Public Shared ReadOnly BitmapScalingModeProperty As DependencyProperty

summary.span: 标识 附加属性。

span.span: Identifies the attached property.

summary.span: 获取或设置给定 的缓存失效阈值最大值。

span.span: Gets or sets the cache invalidation threshold maximum value for a given .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此附加的属性支持的及其派生类型。This attached property is supported by and its derived types. 它旨在用于具有中间的图面，例如画笔和。It is intended to be used with brushes that have intermediate surfaces, such as and . 它仅有一种效果时属性设置为。It only has an effect when the property is set to . 默认情况下[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]不会缓存的已呈现的内容和对象。By default, [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] does not cache the rendered contents of and objects. 在静态方案中，其中内容和场景中的画笔的使用都不会更改，不缓存该内容带来一个好处，因为这可节省视频内存。In static scenarios, where neither the contents nor the use of the brush in the scene is changing, not caching the content provides a benefit because it conserves video memory. 当以非静态方法的默认行为使用具有静态内容的画笔[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]重新呈现的画笔的所有内容每一帧，即使内容不变。When a brush with static content is used in a non-static way, the default behavior of [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] is to re-render all the content of the brush every frame, even though the content is unchanging. 例如，这将会发生时静态或映射到旋转 3D 对象的图面。For example, this will happen when a static or is mapped to the surface of a rotating 3D object. 重新呈现的静态内容可以对性能产生负面影响。Re-rendering the static content can have a negative impact on performance. 通过设置附加属性的画笔应用于，可以通过使用缓存的版平铺的画笔对象提高性能。By setting the attached property on the brush to , you can increase performance by using cached versions of the tiled brush objects. 并属性值是相对大小值，确定何时应由于比例更改而重新生成对象。The and property values are relative-size values that determine when the object should be regenerated because of changes in scale. 例如，当属性设置为 2.0 中，为缓存需要仅当其大小超出了大小当前缓存的两倍时重新生成。For example, when the property is set to 2.0, the cache for the needs to be regenerated only when its size exceeds two times the size of the current cache. 若要访问此属性在代码中的，使用和方法。To access this property in code, use the and methods. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用缓存提示选项用于。The following example shows how to use the caching hint option for a . [!code-xml[RenderOptions#CachingXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/RenderOptions/CSharp/Window1.xaml#cachingxaml)]

Public Shared ReadOnly CacheInvalidationThresholdMaximumProperty As DependencyProperty

summary.span: 标识 附加属性。

span.span: Identifies the attached property.

summary.span: 获取或设置给定 的缓存失效阈值最小值。

span.span: Gets or sets the cache invalidation threshold minimum value for a given .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此附加的属性支持的及其派生类型。This attached property is supported by and its derived types. 它旨在用于具有中间的图面，例如画笔和。It is intended to be used with brushes that have intermediate surfaces, such as and . 它仅有一种效果时属性设置为。It only has an effect when the property is set to . 默认情况下[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]不会缓存的已呈现的内容和对象。By default, [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] does not cache the rendered contents of and objects. 在静态方案中，其中内容和场景中的画笔的使用都不会更改，不缓存该内容带来一个好处，因为这可节省视频内存。In static scenarios, where neither the contents nor the use of the brush in the scene is changing, not caching the content provides a benefit because it conserves video memory. 具有静态内容的画笔中非静态的使用时的默认行为方式[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]重新呈现的画笔的所有内容每一帧，即使内容不变。When a brush with static content is used in a non-static way the default behavior of [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] is to re-render all the content of the brush every frame, even though the content is unchanging. 例如，这将会发生时静态或映射到旋转 3D 对象的图面。For example, this will happen when a static or is mapped to the surface of a rotating 3D object. 重新呈现的静态内容可以对性能产生负面影响。Re-rendering the static content can have a negative impact on performance. 通过设置附加属性的画笔应用于，可以通过使用缓存的版平铺的画笔对象提高性能。By setting the attached property on the brush to , you can increase performance by using cached versions of the tiled brush objects. 并属性值是相对大小值，确定何时应由于比例更改而重新生成对象。The and property values are relative-size values that determine when the object should be regenerated because of changes in scale. 例如，当属性设置为 0.5，用于缓存需要重新生成仅当其大小减少到小于一半的当前缓存大小。For example, when the property is set to 0.5, the cache for the needs to be regenerated only when its size is reduced to less than one half the size of the current cache. 若要访问此属性在代码中的，使用和方法。To access this property in code, use the and methods. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用缓存提示选项用于。The following example shows how to use the caching hint option for a . [!code-xml[RenderOptions#CachingXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/RenderOptions/CSharp/Window1.xaml#cachingxaml)]

summary.span: 标识 附加属性。

span.span: Identifies the attached property.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个指示应尽可能缓存呈现内容的值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates that rendered content should be cached when possible.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此附加的属性支持的及其派生类型。This attached property is supported by and its derived types. 它旨在用于具有中间的图面，例如画笔和。It is intended to be used with brushes that have intermediate surfaces, such as and . 默认情况下[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]不会缓存的已呈现的内容和对象。By default, [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] does not cache the rendered contents of and objects. 在静态方案中，其中内容和场景中的画笔的使用都不会更改，不缓存带来一个好处，因为这可节省视频内存。In static scenarios, where neither the contents nor the use of the brush in the scene is changing, not caching provides a benefit because it conserves video memory. 当以非静态方法的默认行为使用具有静态内容的画笔[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]重新呈现的画笔的所有内容每一帧，即使内容不变。When a brush with static content is used in a non-static way, the default behavior of [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] is to re-render all the content of the brush every frame, even though the content is unchanging. 例如，这将会发生时静态或映射到旋转 3D 对象的图面。For example, this will happen when a static or is mapped to the surface of a rotating 3D object. 重新呈现的静态内容可以对性能产生负面影响。Re-rendering the static content can have a negative impact on performance. 通过设置附加属性的画笔应用于，可以通过使用缓存的版平铺的画笔对象提高性能。By setting the attached property of the brush to , you can increase performance by using cached versions of the tiled brush objects. 并属性值是相对大小值，确定何时应由于比例更改而重新生成对象。The and property values are relative-size values that determine when the object should be regenerated because of changes in scale. 例如，当属性设置为 2.0 中，为缓存需要仅当其大小超出了大小当前缓存的两倍时重新生成。For example, when the property is set to 2.0, the cache for the needs to be regenerated only when its size exceeds two times the size of the current cache. 若要访问此属性在代码中的，使用和方法。To access this property in code, use the and methods. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用缓存提示选项用于。The following example shows how to use the caching hint option for a . summary.span: 标识 附加属性。

span.span: Identifies the attached property.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值向呈现引擎指示能否用 ClearType 呈现文本。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates to the rendering engine whether text can be rendered with ClearType.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用附加属性以指示可以与可视化树的特定部分中的 ClearType 呈现文本。Use the attached property to indicate that text can be rendered with ClearType in a specific part of the visual tree. ClearType 文本不是完全不透明背景上无法正确显示。ClearType text does not display correctly on a background that is not fully opaque. 中间呈现目标，如， ， ， ， ，并，可能会引入不是完全不透明的背景。Intermediate render targets, such as , , , , , and , can introduce backgrounds that are not fully opaque. 检测到在其中绘制文本的缓冲区可能具有透明背景时，WPF 将禁用 ClearType。WPF disables ClearType when it detects that the buffer into which text is drawn could have a transparent background. 设置属性设置为来指示子树是安全的 ClearType 呈现文本。Set the property to to indicate that a subtree is safe for ClearType text rendering. 仅当可以肯定，到完全不透明背景呈现文本时，才执行此操作。Do this only when you can be certain that the text is rendering to a fully opaque background. 子树中的元素引入了透明度，即可启用 ClearType;但是，可能会呈现问题。When an element in the subtree introduces transparency, you can enable ClearType; however, rendering issues may occur. 如果子树的一部分引入了更多的中间呈现目标，则必须设置再次对该子树的子对象。If a portion of the subtree introduces more intermediate rendering targets, you must set again on the children of that subtree. 以下列表显示如何确保要用 ClearType 呈现文本是否正确显示。The following list shows how to make sure that text to be rendered with ClearType appears correctly. - 不会引入之间的中间呈现器目标和能否用 ClearType 呈现文本。Do not introduce intermediate render targets between and the text to be rendered with ClearType. - 将分配是尽可能接近可视化树中的文本的不透明背景。Assign an opaque background that is as close as possible in the visual tree to the text. - 请注意，重新启用 ClearType 子树; 但是，不会强制 ClearType 呈现。Be aware that re-enables ClearType for a subtree; however, it does not force ClearType rendering. - 请注意，不会覆盖您的系统设置或设置。Be aware that does not override your system settings or settings. > [!NOTE] > 附加的属性不会影响控制; 但是，它的工作原理与控件。The attached property does not affect the control; however, it does work with the control. > [!NOTE] > 在许多控件上附加的属性具有不起作用，除非设置不透明背景文本的背景。On many controls, the attached property has no effect unless you set an opaque background behind the text. 若要访问此属性在代码中的，使用和方法。To access this property in code, use the and methods. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何将属性会影响可视化树的不同分支。The following example shows how the property affects different branches of the visual tree. 在第一个文本块控件中，文本的文本块从主窗口中继承设置，因此用 ClearType 呈现。In the first text block control, text is rendered with ClearType because the text block inherits the setting from the main window. 在第二个文本块，ClearType 不能使用因为父元素的属性设置。In the second text block, ClearType is not used because the parent element's property is set. 在第三个文本块中，使用，但可能会出现呈现问题。In the third text block, is used, but rendering issues may occur. ```xaml ```

Public Shared ReadOnly ClearTypeHintProperty As DependencyProperty

summary.span: 标识 附加属性。

span.span: Identifies the attached property.

summary.span: 为非文本基元获取或设置可确定其边缘呈现方式的 枚举值。

span.span: Gets or sets the enumeration value for a non-text primitive that determines how its edges are rendered.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用附加属性，以提高通过指定可视对象应呈现为具有锯齿边缘的呈现性能。Use the attached property to improve rendering performance by specifying that a visual object should be rendered with aliased edges. 文本对象始终显示使用抗锯齿功能，并通过设置边缘模式值不受影响。Text objects are always displayed with anti-aliasing, and are unaffected by setting the edge mode value. 当设置视觉对象的边缘模式值时，视觉对象的所有子代绘图基元设置为相同的边缘模式值。When you set the edge mode value of a visual object, all the descendant drawing primitives of the visual object are set to the same edge mode value. 若要访问此属性在代码中的，使用和方法。To access this property in code, use the and methods. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|

Public Shared Property ProcessRenderMode As RenderMode

summary.span: 指定当前进程的呈现模式首选项。

span.span: Specifies the render mode preference for the current process.

value.span: 当前进程的 首选项。

span.span: The preference for the current process.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来强制软件呈现当前进程。Use the property to force software rendering for the current process. 您可以避免许多呈现问题的 WPF 应用程序中发生，并且，由外部问题，如果更改软件呈现到首选项。You can avoid many rendering issues that occur in WPF applications and that are caused by external issues if you change your preference to software rendering. 应用程序在启动期间，如果你的应用程序检测到的呈现问题，例如较慢的帧率可以呈现模式设置为仅软件。During application startup, if your application detects rendering issues, such as slow frame rates, you can set the rendering mode to software only. 此外，你可能想要启用用户设置，该应用程序运行时。Also, you may want to enable the user setting while the application is running. 首选项替代设置。The preference overrides the setting. 软件呈现的优先顺序是：The precedence order for software rendering is: 1. DisableHWAcceleration 注册表项DisableHWAcceleration registry key 2. 3. （每个目标） (per-target) **请注意**指定首选项并不一定更改的实际呈现模式。**Note** specifies a preference and does not necessarily change the actual rendering mode. 系统的其他部分可能会重写此首选项和强制系统使用软件呈现。Other parts of the system may override this preference and force the system into software rendering.

span.span: to set this property.
Associated enumeration:

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法或对位图进行动画处理的后代。Use the method on a or descendant that is animating a bitmap. 对任何位图缩放进行动画处理时，默认高质量图像重采样算法有时可能由于消耗过多系统资源导致帧速率下降，从而导致动画明显变慢。When animating the scale of any bitmap, the default high-quality image re-sampling algorithm can sometimes consume sufficient system resources to cause frame rate degradation, effectively causing animations to stutter. 通过设置的属性对象传递给，缩放位图时，可以创建更为流畅的动画。By setting the property of the object to , you can create a smoother animation when scaling a bitmap. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置为对象。The following example shows how to set the for an object. [!code-csharp[RenderOptions#RenderOptionsSnippet2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/RenderOptions/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#renderoptionssnippet2)] [!code-vb[RenderOptions#RenderOptionsSnippet2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/RenderOptions/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#renderoptionssnippet2)]

.method public static hidebysig void SetCachingHint(class System.Windows.DependencyObject target, valuetype System.Windows.Media.CachingHint cachingHint) cil managed

static member SetCachingHint : System.Windows.DependencyObject * System.Windows.Media.CachingHint -> unit

param.name: target
param.span: 要设置其 属性的值的依赖项对象。

param.span: 要将此属性设为的新值。

summary.span: 设置指定的依赖对象上的 附加属性值。

span.span: Sets the value of the attached property on a specified dependency object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]不会缓存的已呈现的内容和对象。By default, [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] does not cache the rendered contents of and objects. 在静态方案中，其中内容和场景中的画笔的使用都不会更改，不缓存带来一个好处，因为这可节省视频内存。In static scenarios, where neither the contents nor the use of the brush in the scene is changing, not caching provides a benefit because it conserves video memory. 当以非静态方法的默认行为使用具有静态内容的画笔[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]重新呈现的画笔的所有内容每一帧，即使内容不变。When a brush with static content is used in a non-static way, the default behavior of [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] is to re-render all the content of the brush every frame, even though the content is unchanging. 例如，这将会发生时静态或映射到旋转 3D 对象的图面。For example, this will happen when a static or is mapped to the surface of a rotating 3D object. 重新呈现的静态内容可以对性能产生负面影响。Re-rendering the static content can have a negative impact on performance. 通过设置附加属性的画笔应用于，可以通过使用缓存的版平铺的画笔对象提高性能。By setting the attached property of the brush to , you can increase performance by using cached versions of the tiled brush objects. 并属性值是相对大小值，确定何时应由于比例更改而重新生成对象。The and property values are relative-size values that determine when the object should be regenerated because of changes in scale. 例如，当属性设置为 2.0 中，为缓存需要仅当其大小超出了大小当前缓存的两倍时重新生成。For example, when the property is set to 2.0, the cache for the needs to be regenerated only when its size exceeds two times the size of the current cache. 此方法用于设置附加在代码中的属性。Use this method to set the attached property in code. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用缓存提示选项用于。The following example shows how to use the caching hint option for a . [!code-csharp[RenderOptions#RenderOptionsSnippet3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/RenderOptions/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#renderoptionssnippet3)] [!code-vb[RenderOptions#RenderOptionsSnippet3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/RenderOptions/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#renderoptionssnippet3)]

span.span: The specified is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 文本对象始终显示使用抗锯齿功能，并通过设置边缘模式值不受影响。Text objects are always displayed with anti-aliasing, and are unaffected by setting the edge mode value. 当设置视觉对象的边缘模式值时，视觉对象的所有子代绘图基元设置为相同的边缘模式值。When you set the edge mode value of a visual object, all the descendant drawing primitives of the visual object are set to the same edge mode value. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用方法以设置到视觉对象的边缘模式。The following example shows how to use the method to set the edge mode for a visual object to . [!code-csharp[VisualSnippets#SetEdgeMode](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/VisualSnippets/CSharp/Snippets.cs#setedgemode)] [!code-vb[VisualSnippets#SetEdgeMode](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/VisualSnippets/visualbasic/snippets.vb#setedgemode)]

span.span: The specified is .
